title: Pretty new, but not THAT new!
body:
I've played LoL for quite some time now! **BUT** it says "_Account Level: 1_" I don't get it maybe when i download the game again it would work?

Please help, **My Friend** Had the same problem but it got fixed, so it **_Might_** fix itself, but idk.

I'll contact you guys later when i have downloaded the game _Again_. See you soon! Imma be coming with updates soon enough! BTW i have added a pole to see if it fixes itself!

-**Nyan**

replies.body: It doesn't look like the account you are posting from has played any games, so I'm guessing you might be logging on to an incorrect account.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team will help you recover your account.  In the meantime, you can also use our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) in case that might help as well.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
